sentences.english: In other words, their goal in learning intonation is not clearly defined.
sentences.chinese: 也就是說，他們在語調學習上處於無的放矢的狀態。

sentences.english: When revising you need clear targets – never be aimless.
sentences.chinese: 複習時要目標明確，決不能無的放矢。

sentences.english: The author who composed them must have created them intentionally.
sentences.chinese: 創作它們的作者，本來不可能是在無的放矢。
